snippet: More than 10 officers, and possibly as many as 31, were shot to death by bandits while trying to recover stolen livestock, according to the internal security ministry.
abstract: More than 10 police officers, and possibly as many as 31, are killed by cattle rustlers in ambush in remote part of northern Kenya, in one of more brazen cases in war against livestock thieves.

byline.contributor: Reuben Kyama contributed from Nairobi, Kenya.

lead_paragraph: More than 10 officers, and possibly as many as 31, were shot to death by bandits while trying to recover stolen livestock, according to the internal security ministry.

headline.seo: Kenyan Officers Killed in Attack by Cattle Rustlers
headline.main: Cattle Rustlers Kill Police Officers During Ambush in Northern Kenya, Officials Say
headline.print_headline: Cattle Rustlers Kill Police Officers During Ambush in Northern Kenya, Officials Say
